author: jsign
content:
Hey all. I created a new EIP which formally describes the currently expected state conversion strategy/algorithm for MPT->VKT: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8752/files 
(Rendered: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/95be5e4b16cb14e3c192b1e7619f42936234cefd/EIPS/eip-7748.md)
